name: Avengers in Galactic Storm
summary: Avengers in Galactic Storm is a 1995 fighting arcade game based on characters in the Marvel universe, primarily the The Avengers but also the Kree. The game's plot and roster of playable characters is based on the Operation: Galactic Storm story arc. This was one of Data East's last fighting games, as well as their third and last game based on The Avengers.
